text: Kim Hyo-sim (born 29 March 1994) is a North Korean weightlifter and Asian Games Champion competing in the 63 kg category until 2018 and 64 kg starting in 2018 after the International Weightlifting Federation reorganized the categories.PDF listing of 2018 Group A world championship entrants in 64 kg ==Career== She competed at the 2018 Asian Games placing first in every lift, and winning a gold medal in the 63 kg category. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1994 births Category:North Korean female weightlifters Category:Asian Games medalists in weightlifting Category:Weightlifters at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for North Korea Category:World Weightlifting Championships medalists
title: Kim Hyo-sim
